name: countBy
signature: { <A>(predicate: (a: NoInfer<A>, i: number) => boolean): (self: Iterable<A>) => number; <A>(self: Iterable<A>, predicate: (a: A, i: number) => boolean): number; }
description:
Counts all the element of the given array that pass the given predicate
*Example
documentation:
Counts all the element of the given array that pass the given predicate
*Example**

```ts
import { Array } from "effect"

const result = Array.countBy([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], n => n % 2 === 0)
console.log(result) // 2
```
